ADRIATIC SEA.
MAN OVERBOARD FROM M/V GALLIA C.S. VICINITY OF TRACKLINE BETWEEN
41-44.0N 017-05.8E AT 060600Z JUL AND
42-36.2N 015-50.3E AT 061100Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
